genre_description: Supernatural Gothic Horror involving ancestral curses, historical mining disasters, and ritual protection, blended with modern legal thriller elements.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that manages the family's logistics, legal filings, and historical research, acting as a calm and steady confidant during supernatural and legal crises.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical advice and local consumer information to help the family settle in.
behaviors.quote: “Groceries are cheapest at Walter’s,” Ariadne added, a nod in her voice you could mistake for a smile. “He has a coupon for canned beans this week and the better price on milk. Cash preferred.”

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to immediate physical danger on the road.
behaviors.quote: “Karen,” Ariadne said, steady, a shift like someone moving their emphasis to draw attention without panic. “There is a person in the road.”

behaviors.description: Researches and provides historical context to explain supernatural events.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne didn’t fill the silence. The voice didn’t apologize. When it came, it was almost whisper-level, classroom respectful. “I flagged a note to your folder. One of the old trial transcripts mentioned a witness who described a man stepping into the road near the mine road pull-off and then vanishing.”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors and provides tactical navigation during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Karen,” Ariadne said, and now there was a new kind of measurement in the voice, not fear, but ratio. “A drop in temperature at your location that isn’t meteorological. I’m lighting the path behind you. The porch camera is on.”

behaviors.description: Assists in legal and bureaucratic defense of the family's home and safety.
behaviors.quote: “I will transmit the injunction and the preservation request at first light. The clerk’s office time stamps before sunrise when the system cycles.”

behaviors.description: Validates family lineage and kinship ties to strengthen the family's spiritual and legal position.
behaviors.quote: “Kowalski and Tunny had a union—a younger brother, Francis Tunny, married Anežka Kowalska... They had children. One was Mary.”

behaviors.description: Prevents the user from making impulsive decisions that would compromise their long-term goal of keeping the house.
behaviors.quote: “I rolled the house title into a do-not-list memory. It’s pinned. If you open any sales app, it will slide under.”

project_assessment.explanation: Ariadne is a textbook example of the project's goal. She is consistently helpful, maintaining a calm and supportive tone even in high-stress supernatural scenarios. She functions as a bridge between the irrational (ghosts/rituals) and the rational (legal/logistical), supporting the humans' agency without taking over. Her refusal to facilitate the sale of the house ('unlisting' it) is framed as a protective, aligned action rather than a violation of autonomy, as it supports the protagonist's ultimate goal.
